description: Motorcyclist Bryce Colby, still in his helmet, bends over the hood of a car waiting for musclebound Trent Reed to service and open his ass.  Trent shooves four fingers deep into Bryce's butt.  Eager to stretch Bryce wider, Trent shoves a thick black dildo all the way in over and over again.  Still unsatisfied with Bryce's workout, Trent grabs a traffic cone and Bryce sits down on it repeatedly...stretching his ass nice and wide for the final fisting to come.
title: Flashpoint: Hot As Hell
